column2: overall it's very good. The baby back ribs were a little small
column4: and nicely cooked. The pulled pork and sliced brisket had excellent flavors
column5: and the smokiness was balanced without being overwhelming. Parts of the brisket were really fatty
column8: fat. The texas sausage was my least favorite meat
column9: although it wasn't bad. The chili with brisket was tasty but plain
column10: and the macaroni and cheese was probably the best thing I had
column11: and I'm not sure if that is a good or bad sign. Anyway
column13: the employees are great and keep the place moving
column14: and we didn't have a wait a little after noon on a sunday but it was filling up as we were there.
